generate_payroll.description: Calculates attendance, leaves, and salary components to generate monthly payroll.

list_payrolls.description: Returns a list of all generated payroll batches.

finalize_payroll.description: Locks the payroll batch and marks it as finalized.

mark_salary_paid.description: Marks an individual employee's salary record as paid.

generate_payslip.description: Generates a payslip record for a specific payroll item.

download_payslip.description: Retrieves the download link for the generated payslip PDF.
